Font loading test

This is a paragraph. This is heavier text. This is emphasized text. This is heavier and emphasized text.

This paragraph has font-weight: 300.

 

300 browser synthesized version.

This paragraph has font-weight: 400.

 

400 browser synthesized version.

This paragraph has font-weight: 500.

 

500 browser synthesized version.

600 browser synthesized version.
